Title: Relates to unlawfully summoning a police officer with intent to harm another
Summary: Relates to unlawfully summoning a police officer with intent to harm another; a civil action can be brought for such unlawful event.
LawCode: Add ยง77-a, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to unlawfully summoning a police officer with intent to harm another
